text: This is a list of general managers in the National Hockey League. In the National Hockey League, the general manager of a team typically controls player trades and talks about contracts with players. He is also responsible for the coaches. ==Current NHL general managers== Team General Manager Tenured since Anaheim Ducks Arizona Coyotes Boston Bruins Don Sweeney Buffalo Sabres Calgary Flames Carolina Hurricanes Don Waddell March 7, 2018 Chicago Blackhawks Colorado Avalanche Columbus Blue Jackets Dallas Stars Detroit Red Wings Steve Yzerman Edmonton Oilers Ken Holland Florida Panthers Los Angeles Kings Minnesota Wild Montreal Canadiens Nashville Predators New Jersey Devils Ray Shero May 4 2015 New York Islanders New York Rangers Ottawa Senators Philadelphia Flyers Pittsburgh Penguins San Jose Sharks St. Louis Blues Tampa Bay Lightning Julien BriseBois September 11, 2018 Toronto Maple Leafs Lou Lamoriello July 23 2015 Vancouver Canucks Washington Capitals Winnipeg Jets ==References== General Managers Category:Lists of sportspeople
title: List of NHL General Managers
